meanings.definition: A man engaged to be married.
meanings.sent1: He proudly showed off the ring to his fiances.
meanings.sent2: The fiances went ring shopping together.
meanings.sent3: The fiances giggled as they tried on silly hats for the wedding.
meanings.sent4: His love for her sparkled brighter than the diamond he gave his fiances.
meanings.sent5: The fiances danced under the stars, dreaming of their future together.

meanings.definition: A woman engaged to be married.
meanings.sent1: She excitedly told her friends about her fiances.
meanings.sent2: The fiances picked out flowers for the wedding.
meanings.sent3: The fiances joked about who would cry more at the wedding.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone with happiness as she hugged her fiances tightly.
meanings.sent5: The fiances walked hand in hand, planning their life together.
